courses.title: E-Commerce Website
courses.description: A fully functional e-commerce platform that includes product listings, shopping cart functionality, and secure payment processing.

courses.title: Live Document Editing Tool
courses.description: A feature-rich platform for seamless document collaboration, offering real-time editing and commenting features.

courses.title: PDF  Summarizer
courses.description: A PDF reader application that utilizes machine learning for document summarization and information retrieval.

courses.title: AI-Powered Chatbot
courses.description: Developed a chatbot utilizing the GenMini Large Language Model (LLM) to deliver accurate, responsive conversational experiences. Implemented advanced natural language processing techniques for dynamic and context-aware interactions.

courses.title: Todo
courses.description: Developed a responsive and user-friendly to-do app using React.js. The app allows users to create, update, and manage tasks with an intuitive interface. It incorporates state management for real-time updates and dynamic task handling, enhancing productivity and ensuring an efficient task management experience.

courses.title: Chatbot
courses.description: A chatbot application developed with the MERN stack, designed to improve user engagement and support on websites.

courses.title: Real-time chat application
courses.description: Built a real-time messaging application with Socket.io, Node.js, and Express.js for seamless, interactive communication
